title: (x) Grafic Europe geometric sans - House Chalet {Yves}
content:
Can anyone identify this Helvetica - Avante Garde hybrid?

[http://www.graphiceurope.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193206/http:/www.graphiceurope.com/ "http://www.graphiceurope.com/")

Cheers
author: marc

comments.content: The nifty [House Chalet New York 1960](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193206/http:/www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts) from [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193206/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries), which you can use in Helvetica/Akzidenz-Grotesk (1960), ITC Bauhaus (1970) or ITC Avant Garde Gothic (1980) mode.
